client-a send ATOMIC
client-a send PUSH {"name": "first"}
client-a send PUSH {"name": "second", "blocked_by": [-100]}
client-a send DONE
client-a recv ERR {"msg":"message 1: PUSH: invalid relative task position in blocked by"}

client-a send ATOMIC
client-a send PUSH {"name": "first", "blocked_by": [0]}
client-a send DONE
client-a recv ERR {"msg":"message 0: PUSH: cannot self reference in blocked by"}
